          <title>
            <string language="fr">Combustibles fossiles</string>
            <string language="en">Fossil fuels</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fossilbrennstoffe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Combustíveis fossil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Combustibili fossili</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απολιθωμένα καύσιμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Combustibles fósiles</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme à barres montre combien de temps encore les combustibles fossiles tels que le pétrole, le gaz et le charbon vont durer.</string>
            <string language="en">This bar chart shows how much longer fossil fuels such as oil, gas and coal will last.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">diagramme à barres</string>
            <string language="en">bar chart</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">charbon</string>
            <string language="en">coal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">consommation</string>
            <string language="en">Consumption</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">combustible fossile</string>
            <string language="en">fossil fuel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">gaz</string>
            <string language="en">Gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">sources d'énergie non-renouvelables</string>
            <string language="en">non-renewable energy  sources</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">huile</string>
            <string language="en">oil</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Balkendiagramm zeigt, wieviel längere 
Fossilbrennstoffe wie Öl-, Gas- und Kohlewille dauern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta carta de barra mostra quanto uns 
combustíveis fossil mais longos tais como a vontade do óleo, do gás
e do carvão duram.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo diagramma a colonna mostra quanto i 
combustibili fossili più lunghi quale la volontà del petrolio, del 
gas e del carbone durano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το ιστόγραμμα εμφανίζει πόσα μακρύτερα 
απολιθωμένα καύσιμα όπως το πετρέλαιο, αέριο και ο άνθρακας 
θα διαρκέσουν.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta carta de barra muestra cuánto duran 
combustibles fósiles más largos tales como voluntad del aceite, del 
gas y del carbón.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Balkendiagramm</string>
